scripts.restart: export AWS_PROFILE=$npm_config_profile && docker-compose stop $npm_config_service && docker-compose up -d $npm_config_service
scripts.login: source ../config/build.env && aws ecr get-login-password --region us-west-1 --profile ${profile} | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin ${ECR_REPOSITORY_URL}
scripts.tag: source ../config/build.env && docker tag h2x-prod-web:latest ${WEB_REMOTE_IMAGE_TAG} && docker tag h2x-prod-worker:latest ${WORKER_REMOTE_IMAGE_TAG}
scripts.prep: source ../config/build.env && mkdir -p ${WEB_DIST} && mkdir -p ${WORKER_DIST} && sed "s#_IMAGE_NAME_#${WEB_REMOTE_IMAGE_TAG}#g" Dockerrun.aws.template.json > ${WEB_DIST}/Dockerrun.aws.json && sed "s#_IMAGE_NAME_#${WORKER_REMOTE_IMAGE_TAG}#g" Dockerrun.aws.template.json > ${WORKER_DIST}/Dockerrun.aws.json
